about_the_game:
It is 1972 and the Rhodesian Bush War is hotting up, with Rhodesian forces being deployed across the country to stem the tide of insurgents entering the country from neighbouring states.

As a Rhodesian commander, wage a counter-insurgency (COIN) war to secure the region, on the borders with hostile nation states.

In order to win the Hearts and Minds of the local population you will need to track and destroy the ZAPO/ZANU insurgents, who infiltrate from across the border and destabilize the region by intimidating the locals, laying mines and ambushing your forces.

Zambia, Mozambique and Botswana provide a secure base from which the insurgents can operate, and it will be imperative that you take external action in order to gain control of the situation.

To carry out your COIN mission, co-ordination of ground troops, special forces, artillery, mechanized units and air force assets is essential, but of greater consequence is winning the support of the local population. With greater co-operation from the local inhabitants comes the reward of intelligence, a key factor in COIN warfare.

The war is not fought in isolation, so as the commander of the Rhodesian forces, you will have the added complexity of managing the support for the war from within your own borders, should you the lose the support of your local constituency, the war will also be surely lost.
This is a game that captures the true essence of the Rhodesian War, where counter-insurgency operations are paramount, gathering intel, tracking the insurgents and destroying their bases in neighbouring states plays a critical role in containing the insurgency.

Rise through the ranks and watch your personalized uniform transform from a junior Lieutenant to General as you relive the Rhodesian Bush War.

Features
  • Hearts and Minds victory conditions
  • Turn based strategy game, procedurally generated at the start of every new game thereby ensuring extended playability.
  • Full and authentic order of battle management
  • Political support model, stakeholder management of the sentiment back home.
  • Fire Force deployments (RLI)
  • Specialized units of the Rhodesian Army (Grey Scouts)
  • Full range of Rhodesian units including transport helicopters, APC’s, armor, Gunships, Engineers etc
  • Full tracking and detection model, including helicopter air support
  • Special Forces operations (SAS) and cross border raids (Selous Scouts)
  • Operational intelligence map
  • Air strikes
  • Medevacs and in field repairs
  • Minesweeping and ambushes
  • Full logistical model, including vehicle repairs and maintenance
  • Road and base construction
  • Handover and intervention of BMAT (British Monitoring and Training Advisory Team)

content_descriptors.notes: Military abstract simulation of the Rhodesian Bush War.
